org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel
Class AeTypeMappingHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.AeTypeMappingHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeTypesContext
public class AeTypeMappingHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeTypesContext

Helper class for registering custom serializers/deserializers for sending/receiving SOAP messages using the RPC/encoded style.

Field Summary
private  org.apache.axis.encoding.DeserializerFactory mDeserializerFactory
          cached deserializer factory, we can reuse this for all mappings

getTypeMappings

public AeTypeMappingTuple[] getTypeMappings()
Registers the types required for the specified operation.

Returns:
array of mappings or null if none of the types in the input/output message require special serialization/deserialization

fixPart

public static java.lang.Object fixPart(javax.wsdl.Part aPart,
                                       java.lang.Object aValue)
If the part is a type and the value is a document then this method will change the root element of the document so that its name matches the name of the part. This is required by the BPEL spec.

Parameters:
aPart - The wsdl part
aValue - The value for the part
Returns:
Object the same as the value passed in (although the root element may have changed)
